caption.p: Top 16 network-predicted repurposable drugs with literature-derived antiviral evidence.

table-wrap-foot.p:
HBV hepatitis B virus, HCV hepatitis C virus, HDV hepatitis delta virus, EBOV Ebola viruses, ZEBOV-GP Zaire Ebola virus glycoprotein, HIV human immunodeficiency virus, EBV Epstein-Barr virus, ANDV Andes orthohantavirus, EMCV encephalomyocarditis virus, FECV feline enteric coronavirus, RSV respiratory syncytial virus, EV71 enterovirus 71, HSV-1 and -2 herpes simplex viruses, CVB
4 Coxsackievirus B 4.
